data.actual_result: The last 2 buttons (Delete message and Report) aren't visible. Only touching them makes it visible.
data.expected_result: All buttons for the message menu should be visible.
data.short_description: [iOS 10+ only] [iPad with 10.5"/or smaller only] Text of the last two buttons for message interaction disappears after closing keyboard
data.steps_to_repro: - Rotate your iPad to the landscape mode - Make sure you have `Manage Messages` and `Add Reaction` permission (so all buttons appear) - Go to a text channel and send any message - In the same chat: Click on the message field to open the virtual keyboard - Long press on the message you've sent before - Close the virtual keyboard - Observe the last two buttons for the message interaction
